tool_description: Assigns comprehensive risk scores to contract clauses based on potential legal, financial, and operational impact using multi-factor analysis.

clause_texts.description: Array of clause texts to score for risk

contract_value.description: Total contract value in USD for contextual risk assessment

business_sector.description: Industry sector: technology, healthcare, finance, manufacturing, retail, or other

risk_tolerance.description: Organization's risk tolerance: conservative, moderate, or aggressive

scoring_method.description: Scoring approach: standard, weighted, or comprehensive

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: clause_texts and clause_categories must have the same length.
Invalid business sector: Use one of [technology, healthcare, finance, manufacturing, retail, other].
Invalid risk tolerance: Use one of [conservative, moderate, aggressive].
Invalid scoring method: Use one of [standard, weighted, comprehensive].
Negative contract value: Contract value must be positive if specified.
usage: Provide clause_texts and corresponding clause_categories arrays, optionally specify contract_value, business_sector, risk_tolerance, and scoring_method. Returns detailed risk analysis for each clause.

risk_scores.description: Risk score for each clause (0.0 to 10.0, higher is riskier)

risk_categories.description: Risk category for each clause: low, medium, high, or critical

high_risk_indices.description: Indices of clauses with high or critical risk scores

overall_risk_score.description: Weighted average risk score for the entire contract

risk_factors.description: Primary risk factors identified across all clauses
